Reviews.Title: “Bad surprise”
Reviews.Author: elisabethabib
Reviews.Content: location hotel close metro repubblica safe rome staff helpful arrived hotel 12pm wait 20min ready 2 4 persons entered cleaning expected top cleanliness surprise dirty stains sheets moquette dirty curtains mould bathrooms walls window couldnt close properly rome exceptional snow weather cold equipped soap shampoo 3 towels person clean minifridge airconditioner start hair dryer breakfast poor hour trip lost wallet id possibility taking plane milan idea call hotel photocopy ids checkin flight company ok photocopy staff told unfortunately throw checkout possibility plane train according police officer whom talked lost wallet hotel staff obliged documentation checkout guess visit police day hotel bb building isnt giotto flavia holds 2 3 hotels apparently share agreements breakfast served customers hotels 3rd floor building

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable but room for improvement”
Reviews.Author: flothree
Reviews.Content: visited rome october 2011 weekend hotel base location close touristy hustle bustle 6th floor spartan clean comfortable breakfast kept coffee machine entrance makes nice coffee roses receptionists friendly helpful comfortable didnt noisy unlike reviewers yes theres traffic slept found restaurants close hotel prices lot cheaper ones closer tourist attractions half price food ambience fantastic ristorante il pizza literally corner hotel highly recommended hotel dire refurbishment reception shabby carpet lobby scrub replacing stayed dripping toilet couldnt stop stains walls little difference sorted hotel lot lucrative lot promise tlc handyman consider overall experiencebut id constantly dripping noise

Reviews.Title: “Good City Centre Hotel”
Reviews.Author: quark233
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights oct 2011 judging previous reviews improved staff polite friendly helpful clean standard noise road bit city centre lots restaurants minutes hotel pizzaria

Reviews.Title: “Shame they could do more .. if only they wanted.”
Reviews.Author: loidina
Reviews.Content: experience ok staff help management hotel spare cash fresh paint rid horrible humidity stains walls hand bleach deeply clean inner shower doors help breakfast average cant real cappuccino coffee rome hotel automatic machines staff nice smiley cant blame choice

Reviews.Title: “Get a better one!”
Reviews.Author: Rina12321
Reviews.Content: hotel location close central station fraction price probably reception excellent thanks jacob rest struggling cleaner trusted nice lady sheet changed 7 days walls repainting bed comfortable window airconditioning isnt properly television italian safe key missing furnishing rubbish internet connection mentioned accessed reception bfast helpful computer im print boarding pass reception extremely helpful descent bfast avoid giotto flavia location terms restaurants restaurant prices ripped standard rome price 5 euros coffee softdrinks 3 water dont deceived cheapy look eat look prices talking euros person meal rome bring lots water crisp softdrinks bread etc wish cut cost

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel!”
Reviews.Author: suesturtle
Reviews.Content: hotel tired holes walls scrapes doors previously jimmied didnt feel safe airconditioning didnt wrong spotted electric fan dresser cobwebs corners tiny supposed triple bathroom sink plug blocked tv remote didnt worst base bed broken time husband rolled bed base horrendous scraping sound half expecting plywood splinters start poking mattress stayed similarly priced hotels italian cities nicer reflection price

Reviews.Title: “If you get a room there for under 60 Euro its ok”
Reviews.Author: TraveledK
Reviews.Content: discount bed closet ok hostel hotel converted apartments central rome hotels building filled students budget worth opted switch medici doors review actually cheaper medici charged occupancy 60 euro person ok flavia 120 barely accommodate 3 star pay 110
